entry.title: Nick joins the lab
entry.content: Nick Heelan joined the lab on 8/12/2024 as a research technician. He brings extensive experience in supporting research operations, and we are very grateful to have him join us!
entry.summary: Nick Heelan joined the lab on 8/12/2024 as a research technician. He brings extensive experience in supporting research operations, and we are very grateful to have him join us!

entry.title: Lab Website Goes Up
entry.content:
Welcome to the Zhang Laboratory Website!

We will open our doors on January 1st, 2024 in the Department of Physiology at the Michigan State University. Let me know how it looks and how I can improve it. We will be hiring at all levels soon.
entry.summary: Welcome to the Zhang Laboratory Website!
